name: part_001
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ4周年記念LIVE】Special Thank U!! J Medley 【3DLIVE】 [APbMhuPbwkE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa performing 'bullet' at her 4th Anniversary 3D Live.
Instrumental interlude with dynamic stage visuals and lighting.
Performance of 'Sayonara wa' (Goodbye is...) with on-screen lyrics.
Visual glitch effect transition into a different outfit.

subtitles.original: bullet
subtitles.english: bullet

subtitles.original: …運命は止められない
subtitles.english: ...fate cannot be stopped.

subtitles.original: 「さよなら」は 引き止めてって
subtitles.english: "Goodbye" means "please stop me from leaving."

subtitles.original: 「だいじょうぶ」は だいじょうぶじゃなくて
subtitles.english: "I'm okay" means "I'm not okay."

subtitles.original: 「もういい」は 全然よくなくて
subtitles.english: "It's fine" means "it's not fine at all."

subtitles.original: そのままのワタシでいいって言って
subtitles.english: Tell me that I'm fine just the way I am.

subtitles.original: ノイズ
subtitles.english: Noise

subtitles.original: 本当はもっともっと あなたの事を
subtitles.english: Actually, I want to know more and more about you,

subtitles.original: 知りたいよって 一緒にいたいよって
subtitles.english: that I want to know you, that I want to be with you.

subtitles.original: 伝えたら離れてしまいそうで
subtitles.english: If I tell you, I'm afraid you'll leave.

subtitles.original: だから守る事を幸せとした
subtitles.english: So I made protecting this my happiness.

subtitles.original: ねぇ ちゃんと目見て話したらきっと
subtitles.english: Hey, if we speak while looking each other in the eye,

subtitles.original: 伝わる様な気がしてるんだよ
subtitles.english: I feel like I'd surely be able to reach you.

subtitles.original: 面倒くさい 怖い 嫌い でも好き
subtitles.english: Annoying, scary, hate, but still love.

subtitles.original: おんなじなら
subtitles.english: If it's the same...

subtitles.original: キレイだと思った場所見つけて
subtitles.english: Finding a place I thought was beautiful,

subtitles.original: 気に入ってただけだっただけだ
subtitles.english: and just liking it was all it was.

subtitles.original: 逃げるヤツが幸せになる世界ならば
subtitles.english: If this is a world where those who run away find happiness,

subtitles.original: 幸せなんて要らない 要らない
subtitles.english: then I don't need happiness, I don't need it,

subtitles.original: 要らない もう要らない
subtitles.english: I don't need it, I don't need it anymore.

subtitles.original: いつだって一人で抱えるあなた
subtitles.english: You, who are always shouldering things alone,

subtitles.original: ただ見守るしか出来ない私
subtitles.english: and me, who can only watch over you.

subtitles.original: 力になりたいと思うのに
subtitles.english: Even though I want to be of help,

subtitles.original: どうすればいいのか分からない
subtitles.english: I don't know what I should do.

subtitles.original: 繰り返してく 忘れたらきっと
subtitles.english: Repeating... if I forget, surely

subtitles.original: 誰かがまた傷付くから
subtitles.english: someone else will get hurt again.

subtitles.original: 傷に傷を重ねたのは忘れる為？
subtitles.english: Did I layer wound upon wound just to forget?

subtitles.original: それとも…
subtitles.english: Or is it...

subtitles.original: 「さよなら」は 引き止めてって
subtitles.english: "Goodbye" means "please stop me from leaving."

subtitles.original: 「だいじょうぶ」は だいじょうぶじゃなくて
subtitles.english: "I'm okay" means "I'm not okay."

subtitles.original: 「もういい」は 全然よくなくて
subtitles.english: "It's fine" means "it's not fine at all."

subtitles.original: そのままのワタシじゃダメなら
subtitles.english: If I'm not good enough as I am...

subtitles.original: ヘタクソな生き方でしか生きられない
subtitles.english: We can only live in a clumsy way,

subtitles.original: 私達は
subtitles.english: we...

subtitles.original: 一人では出来ない事も二人でなら
subtitles.english: Even things we can't do alone, if we're together,

subtitles.original: 出来る様なそんな
subtitles.english: we can do it, such a...

subtitles.original: 存在になりたかったな
subtitles.english: I wanted to become such a presence.

subtitles.original: 言えない 言えない もう言えない
subtitles.english: I can't say it, I can't say it, I can't say it anymore.

subtitles.original: たったひとつ たったひとつの
subtitles.english: The one and only, the one and only,

subtitles.original: たったひとり たったひとりの
subtitles.english: the one and only, the one and only,

subtitles.original: 私はここ
subtitles.english: I am here.

subtitles.original: Here
subtitles.english: Here

subtitles.original: 喘ぎの胸 息もできない
subtitles.english: Panting chest, unable to breathe.

subtitles.original: 降り出す雨 眠るように
subtitles.english: Falling rain, as if to sleep.

subtitles.original: Cry...
subtitles.english: Cry...

subtitles.original: この世界を生き抜くのならば
subtitles.english: If I am to survive in this world,

subtitles.original: どんな花を飾ればいいの
subtitles.english: what kind of flowers should I decorate with?

subtitles.original: 信じたいくせに
subtitles.english: Even though I want to believe,

subtitles.original: 信じられずに
subtitles.english: I cannot believe.
